column1: Mugnano di Napoli (Neapolitan: Mugnano 'e Napule) is a comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Naples in the Italian region Campania
column2: located about 10 km northwest of Naples.

column1: Mugnano di Napoli borders the following municipalities: Calvizzano
Scuola Filippo Illuminato in Mugnano di Napoli is named in honour of Filippo Illuminato (1930-1943)
